content:
The US military delay is not in favor of Ukraine, but eventually this issue will be resolved.

About thisIn an interview with the ArmyinformThe head of the NATO Military Committee Admiral Rob Bauer said.

“I understand that you need it for yesterday. And many NATO countries speak with the United States to provide a help pack. It is not easy to compensate for such a large amount, but the good news is that more and more countries are concluded with Ukraine for long -term support, ”Rob Bauer said.

He expressed confidence that, after all, the US assistance package would come because problems in the United States are not related to discussions about whether people want to help Ukraine.

“It is about other political things. It is also not saying that there is no two -party support (in the US Congress. - Ed.). And these are good news for Ukraine. Therefore, I hope that all the issues will be resolved and the help package will be provided, ”Rob Bauer said.

Admiral added that 50 countries are working in a contact group on Defense of Ukraine, and every month they are increasingly aware that they should do more.

“Because the war will continue and will not end soon, and Ukraine should outweigh. We cannot allow Russia to win, ”he said.

Recall the White House recently announcedA help package for $ 300 million, which includes airmarks for air defense and critical for advanced delivery.

This is the first US assistance package in 2024. It was announced against the backdrop of blocking additional funding in Congress.
title: NATO Military Committee Chairman: US Package is needed for Ukraine as early as yesterday
description: NATO Bauer, Head of NATO Bauer Military Committee, said this in an interview with the Armyinform. ...
author: Army Inform
